item.title: Deep dive
item.description: extracting different types of nested archives(tar,gz,xz,zip) - Category: Misc Points: 1000 file: deepdive Solution since there is a lot of nested archives there is no way that u can extract it manually so i made this script #!/bin/bash isflag=$(file flag.txt | grep asci| wc -l) while [ $isflag -eq 0 ] do echo "Looking for flag"; iszip=$(file...

item.title: HackTM - FindMyPass
item.description: Dumping Kdbx db from Memory - Category: Forensics Points: 500 Challenge I managed to forget my password for my KeePass Database but luckily I had it still open and managed to get a dump of the system’s memory. Can you please help me recover my password?
